title: PSA: The support isn't going to have a stellar kda.
body:
That soraka isn't gonna be 15/3/6, especially if you lose. You have to throw shade at the support wait till the end of the game and check out the vision stats. Support should outward the rest of the team, easy peasy. Also take note of how the adc was, and understand there's not a lot you can do if Ashe REAAAAALLY wants to tower dive and the support was running back from base.

Note: there's exceptions to everything. Support or not feeding ain't cool. Some supports are gonna get kills, and some supports are gonna be bad. Just take 5 seconds and think before you play the blame game.

replies.body: Nobody counts the A.  they always look at KD when ragging on supports.  Never the A.  And of course the game itself doesn't even count up how many Ks and As you prevented the other team from getting by bailing your ADC out of trouble let alone anyone else.
0/11/14 isn't doing good in my book. I don't give a crap if your kda is above 1. Especially if your deaths are all on their 20/0 Katarina.
Your deaths start counting for considerably less after a while though. I'd rather a support get their 8th or 9th death by tanking a skillshot for the ADC who'd give the enemy team shut-down credit.
And even if you're the last one alive and you get some kills it's still KS.
So does my triple kill as support a couple days ago tilt you?
REEEEEE
Supports usually have the highest KDA in the game unless they fed
psa: being support doesn't give you a free pass when you end up 0-18-4
The point went so above your head it's in orbit right now

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bakXVAo8,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-06-27T08:23:33.808+0000)
>
> The point went so above your head it's in orbit right now

K
you know KDA includes assists? support should almost always have one of the best KDA on team
{{champion:432}} This support is gonna go 15/1/3

> [{quoted}](name=Destructive55AZ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bakXVAo8,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-06-27T07:31:02.718+0000)
>
> {{champion:432}} This support is gonna go 15/1/3

That golden period of time where ap bard could chunk half a squishy's health with a meep.
This is that period of time. I play AP Bard alot and this is very common.
Brad plz
Supports do have good KDAs, as that includes assists.
Only if he's {{champion:136}} ... HAHA get it ? I'll leave..
BUT I NEED EVERYONE TO KNOW IT WASN'T MY FAULT BEFORE OUR NEXUS EXPLODES! CAAAAAAAAAAAAPSLOOOOOOOOCKRAAAAAAAAGE
Lol yes the support should I have between 3 and 5 kda on all my supports.

Supports are the easiest champions to get high KDAs on lol? You sit back on the edge of fights and heal/shield and rack up assists everywhere. Who gives a shit if you die every fight when you're going to get an assist on every teamkill because of locket?
